subject: College Athletics
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Marijuana
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Four former Louisiana State players, including the Heisman Trophy finalist Tyrann Mathieu, were arrested in Baton Rouge after the police said they were found with marijuana at Mathieu’s apartment.
snippet: Four former Louisiana State players, including the Heisman Trophy finalist Tyrann Mathieu, were arrested in Baton Rouge after the police said they were found with marijuana at Mathieu’s apartment.
